General.Name: SWK Holdings Corp
General.Description: SWK Holdings Corporation is a principal investment firm. The firm prefers to invest in healthcare, biopharma, medical devices, diagnostics, life science tools and healthcare service sectors. The firm prefers to invest between $5 million and $20 million transactions. The company was formerly known as Kana Software, Inc. and changed its name to SWK Holdings Corporation in December 2009. SWK Holdings Corporation was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Dallas, Texas.
General.Address: 5956 Sherry Lane, Dallas, TX, United States, 75225
